评论详情: I love this dress. The fabric is a nice quality and it stretches so I don’t feel stuffed in it (even though I had gained a few pounds.) So the fabric rolls out so there isn’t a nice edge. I have to use lots of magic tape it so it won’t buckle out. If I was handy perhaps I could glue of stitch this fabric together. (It’s like they folded the fabric under and then pressed it.)  Other than that, it’s a fabulous dress!

This dress is well made and the fabric is a a substantial weight with just enough stretch. It has a subtle sheen which mimics the look of a heavy silk. I love the fact that the fabric isn’t thin. The cut is very form fitting- more than I like so I ordered one size up and it fits very well. It is snug with stretch but not so tight as to show every lump. I usually wear a 8-10 petite dresses so I ordered a L and it fits right. It is very snug across the tummy and will accentuate this area. The top portion may be too large if you have narrow shoulders and small tatas. The sleeves are slim fit which is nice. I love the retro look , the length ,and the slimming proportions. Fabric may be too heavy for summer, although I ordered one in light blue for next spring since I get chilled in A/C. I’m very happy with the deep navy for fall and winter.

This dress is classy. The dress is true to color.  I  bought both my size and one size up. The one that is my actual size was not tight because the fabric has stretch to it, but it did hug my body and I didn’t like that. The one that was one size bigger, gave me the room my body needed so it didn’t feel like it was hugging my body. It felt perfect. The 3/4 sleeves gave me the coverage I wanted. The length was perfect right below my knee, so I didn’t have to hem it. I liked it so much I’m buying it in various colors for every season.  I know it says you can wash it, but I won’t. Instead, I’ll dry clean it.  I love that it has a V neck both on front and back. I am 5’3” and weigh 163. I normally wear a Size12/14 or a L/XL. I bought both the XL and it hugged my lower half. I ordered the XXL and it fit perfect. I wish the dress was lined and not of stretch fabric, but it’s not. The colors are vibrant and it fits well and is very versatile. I feel this dress can be worn for ANY occasion. I highly recommend this dress if you want to look and feel classy.

This dress is wonderful, I have never had one like it, I love it. It will make you look sophisticated and feminine. I liked. More products, I chose the white color but it is actually more of a wonderful pearl color. The fabric is semi-elastic and highlights exactly what you want to highlight. The collar is lined and wide. It is not glued in the center. You can easily shape your cufflinks and adapt it to your taste. I don't like to show much but it makes you feel divine. The bottom is slightly transparent but not too much. The dress weighs nothing, is comfortable and light. The fabric is resistant. Quality finishes, nothing tight; I recommend that you buy a larger size. I am 1.56 centimeters tall and weigh 84 kilos. I normally wear size L but I ordered an XL and it was the best. I recommend that you order a size larger than what you wear. I will order more in different colors.

I highly recommend  this dress and will be purchasing in a different color.

评论概述: Love this dress - only minor issues
评论详情: Purchased this dress last minute for a courthouse wedding ceremony and I love it.  I also purchased in black, hot pink, and camel.  Am returning the pink because it smells like chemicals.  Overall, I love the fit and style, being a "bride" in her mid-50's.  I did purchase tape for the front flaps, but ran out of time to put it in.  The white is very sheer, so had to wear shapewear to keep my panties from showing.  Fabric is stretchy, a bit difficult to iron, and it wrinkles a bit, but I love it anyway.  :)  I purchased a small.  I am 5/8" 125 pounds and it definitely hugs the curves.  Great value for the price.
